channel.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
channel.description:
Hey i need help about coding my server.
[b]I need to know how to change the EXP that all the monsters give to you when you fight them[/b]...so that training would be harder and take longer.
I would appreciate if someone helps me.
Thanks alot, King.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 05:38:26 PM[/size][hr]Anybody Help?

item.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

search for like, fletching is item on item, so you’d search for

public void guamSeed() // start of farming { if(playerLevel[19] >= 1) { addSkillXP((55*playerLevel[19]), 19); addItem(249, 1); pEmote = 0x831; deleteItem(5291, getItemSlot(5291), 1); sendMessage("You put the seed on the patch and get an herb"); } else if(playerLevel[19] < 1) { sendMessage("You need atleast 1 farming to plant this!"); } }
for farming
and

 More later, ill pm it.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?

item.source: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?

item.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

Search for

80 = level to steal
1000 = xp given
995 = item
350000 = amount

[code]case 2562:
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 550k”, 80, 1000*playerLevel[17], 995, 350000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4878:
TheifStall(“scimitar stall”, “and recieve 100k”, 50, 2000*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4877:
TheifStall(“magic stall”, “and recieve 250k”, 30, 1500*playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4876:
TheifStall(“general stall”, “and recieve 50k”, 1, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 15, 0x340);
break;

case 2560:
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “and recieve 4M”, 99, 100000*playerLevel[17], 995, 4000000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 2565:
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and recieve 900k”, 91, 11000*playerLevel[17], 995, 900000, 30, 0x340);
break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

[quote=“Javaftl, post:3, topic:221041”]Basically, go into client.java, search for

					if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

And replace the

						TotalExp = (double)(100 * hitDiff);

Under it Replace the “100” with the xp given (100 takes around 30-45 minutes for a 99.)[/quote]

Note: i basically just put that…

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?

item.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

Basically, go into client.java, search for

					if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

And replace the

						TotalExp = (double)(100 * hitDiff);

Under it Replace the “100” with the xp given (100 takes around 30-45 minutes for a 99.)

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?

item.title: How Do You Change The Training Experience From Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

ehh…this prolly wont be explained to well but meh,been helping dad so i’m tired,gonna go lay down soon.

alright…go to client.java and search(Ctrl + F) for the xp the hits u do give…lets say its 200…

search totalExp = (double) 200 then change it to what u want it to be,its pretty simple…

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); }

Read full topic
